entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Cornwall
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:19 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Saint-Anicet 10:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: -9.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -19
Dewpoint: -11.8°C
Wind: SW 31 km/h gust 44 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blizzard. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow and blizzard. Blowing snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 90. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 10:19 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blizzard early in the morning. Local blowing snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 10:19 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 10:19 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
